designations: Associate Professor, School of Computer Science and Engineering
biography: Before moving to NTU Singapore, I was a research fellow at the Australian Centre for Robotic Vision (ACRV),  affiliated with The University of Adelaide. I completed my PhD degree at the University of Adelaide in 2014. I received my bachelor's and master's degree from the South China University of Technology (SCUT) in 2007 and 2010, respectively.
